primary.title: Strength Room Training

about.title: About FUGA
about.description: A multidisciplinary sports team dedicated to athletic excellence and performance optimization
about.missionText1: At FUGA, we believe that every athlete deserves access to professional training and coaching. Our mission is to provide comprehensive, science-backed training programs that help athletes across all disciplines reach their full potential.
about.missionText2: Whether you're a competitive athlete or someone looking to improve your fitness, our team of experienced coaches is here to guide you every step of the way.
about.professionalCoaching: Professional coaching staff with years of experience
about.scienceBasedText: We use evidence-based training methods and the latest sports science research to optimize your performance.
about.individualizedText: Every athlete is unique. We create customized training plans based on your goals, abilities, and sport.
about.progressiveText: We focus on continuous improvement through structured progression and regular performance assessments.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to start your training journey? Contact us for more information or to schedule your first session.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your goals and any questions you have...
contact.responseTime: We'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss your training goals.
